attributes.action: Legalise marijuana to absorb some covid financial implications
attributes.additional_details: Legalisation of marijuana and the subsequent tax revenew that would be gained would help to absorb some of the cost of the Covid-19 crisis. It has been proven in many states throughout North America, amongst other places within the world to be a successful way off increasing tax revenew, whilst still maintaining public support for the political party in power.
attributes.background: Government should discuss the possibility of legalising marijuana in order to prevent such large tax increases to repay the costs from covid and the furlough scheme
